headline.main: In The Nation; Some Questions as to North Africa Answered

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 31 -- To several persons here who have been in close touch with events in North Africa, before and since the landings of United States troops, this correspondent today addressed a number of questions. The purpose was to clear up certain confusions in the news from North Africa, if possible.
abstract: A Krock comment on North African mil situation
